Class WeaponFactory

java.lang.Object
com.arena.dual_arena.factories.WeaponFactory
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.almasb.fxgl.entity.EntityFactory
public class WeaponFactory extends Object implements com.almasb.fxgl.entity.EntityFactory
Factory class responsible for the creation and management of weapon entities in the game. This factory uses the FXGL framework to handle entity creation, ensuring each weapon is properly initialized with its specific components.

    • spawnRandomWeapon

      public static void spawnRandomWeapon(double x, double y)
      Spawns a random weapon at a given location.
      Parameters:
      x - The x-coordinate for the weapon spawn location.
      y - The y-coordinate for the weapon spawn location.

    • InfiniteSpawner

      public void InfiniteSpawner()
      Starts an infinite loop that periodically spawns random weapons if there are fewer than three weapons present. Weapons are spawned at random locations within defined bounds.
